column4: In case of CT Images: Shall be present, is CT Image was acquired by Radiotherapy equipment. In case of RT Image: Shall be present, if the Value 1 / Value 2 of Image Type (0008,0008) is ORIGINAL\PRIMARY.

In case of CT Images: Shall be present, is CT Image was acquired by Radiotherapy equipment. In case of RT Image: Shall be present, if the Value 1 / Value 2 of Image Type (0008,0008) is ORIGINAL\PRIMARY.
